actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1245(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides for specified exceptions to the general rule, under the Internal Revenue Code, that the gain from dispositions of qualified depreciable property shall be treated as ordinary income. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 1245 (b))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1245(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954, and for other purposes.
